description: 4. Who is most at risk of catching Ebola?
title: 4. Who is most at risk of catching Ebola?
content:
Everyone is at risk and must therefore take measures to prevent themselves from catching the disease. However, during an outbreak, those at higher risk of infection are: health workers and family members or others in close contact with infected people.

*Exposure to the virus can be controlled through the use of protective
measures in clinics and hospitals, at community gatherings, or at home.*
